property.name: Text
property.value: While there are at least 2 [Pegasus] Friends at this card's Problem, you may turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of a faceoff involving this card, you may ready an exhausted Friend at this card's Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your Score Phase, you may pay 2 to give one of your Friends +2 power until the end of the turn. At the end of your turn, if you have a Friend with at least 5 power, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Retire one of your Friends to reveal the top 3 cards of your deck, put a revealed Friend into your hand, and put all other revealed cards into your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you end your turn, if this card is at home or a Problem with at least 3 of your Friends, turn it over.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, you may retire one of your Friends there to dismiss an opponent's Friend there.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you win a faceoff involving this card, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opposing characters here have -1 power during Problem faceoffs.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, you may pay 2 to turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Faceoff: Discard an Event to give this card +3 power until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play an Event, turn this card over and exhaust it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move this card to a Problem, you may move an opponent's Friend to that problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play a Resource on one of your Friends, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play a Resource on one of your Friends, that Friend gets +2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pay 3 to turn this card over. You pay 1 less action token to turn this card over for each [Critter] Friend you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 1 to move this card to a Problem that has one of your [Critter] Friends there.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem with at least 2 other [Generosity] characters, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your opponent pays +1 to play Events.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust 3 of your Friends to turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: If one of your Friends would be dismissed for being in excess of your home limit, you may exhaust this card to put that Friend in your hand instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an opponent plays a Friend to this card's Problem, you may spend a card from beneath this card to frighten that Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of each player's turn, if this card has at least 1 card beneath it, you may ready it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust one of your Resources at home to ready this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Faceoff: You may play this card to an area where you have a character involved in a faceoff. If you do, it becomes involved in that faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Score Phase: Exhaust another one of your friends and pay 1 to give this card +2 power until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: While involved in a faceoff, this card has +2 power for each card beneath it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: When an opponent's Troublemaker is uncovered at this card's Problem, you may challenge that Troublemaker with all your characters there.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an opponent's Friend is frightened, you may exhaust this card to frighten another Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an opponent takes an action during their Main Phase, you may pay 1 to move this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card to move it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move your Mane Character to a problem, you may exhaust this card to move this card there.

property.name: Text
property.value: While an opponent's Mane Character is at home, if you would draw a card during your Ready Phase, you may draw 2 cards and discard a card instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play at a Problem, you may dismiss an opponent's Troublemaker at that Problem. If an opponent would force you to discard this card, you may put it into play instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, choose a player. That player puts the top 4 cards of their deck into the discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Score Phase: Exhaust one of your Resources at home to give this card +2 power until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this card would be frightened, you may exhaust it instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is retired, put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card. While this card is exhausted, you pay 1 less to rally your Friends (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play at your home, an opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a Friend card from their hand and they discard that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Spend a card from beneath this card to exhaust all characters at this card's Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: During faceoffs involving this card, if this card has at least 1 card beneath it, flip another card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card and pay 1 to reveal a card from your hand and banish it to beneath one of your Friends with Pumped.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this card has at least 1 card beneath it, it can't be dismissed or frightened.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card enters play exhausted. Main Phase: Exhaust this card and put it in your hand to dismiss an exhausted Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Spend a card from beneath this card to draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may retire one of your Friends to add that Friend's power to this card's power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: While an opponent's Mane Character is at home, this card has +1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a number of Friends equal to that card's printed power. Put any number of revealed [Laughter] friends into your hand and shuffle all other revealed cards into your deck. All opponents draw 1 card for each Friend you put into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may retire one of your Friends to gain a number of action tokens equal to that Friend's cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play at a problem, each player shuffles their deck and draws a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card. While this card is exhausted, your opponent needs +2 [Any] to confront this card's Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card and spend 2 cards from beneath it to dismiss an opponent's Friend at this card's Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase, Exhaust and retire this card to replace its Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has +1 power for each card beneath it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you win a faceoff involving this card, you may spend any number of cards from beneath this card to gain 1 for each card you spent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Retire this card to move all other characters at its Problem home. Characters can't be moved or played to that Problem for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an opponent's Friend is moved to this card's Problem, you may exhaust this card to move a different character there home.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: At the end of a Troublemaker Phase, you may retire this card to start a new Troublemaker Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Faceoff: Spend a card from beneath this card to give this card +4 power until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this card to a Problem, frighten a Friend at that Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you move this card to a Problem, you may exhaust this card to turn a Troublemaker there face-down.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase; Exhaust this card to look at the bottom 2 cards of your deck. You may put 1 of them on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Faceoff: Exhaust one of your Resources at home to give this card +2 power until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an opponent plays or moves a Friend to this card's Problem, you may spend a card from beneath this card to move that Friend home.

property.name: Text
property.value: You pay 1 less to play Events. When you play an Event, look at the top card of your deck. You may put that card on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Spend a card from beneath this card to give another character +4 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: While involved in a faceoff, this card also has Supportive 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play this card from your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 1 to exhaust this card. While this card is exhausted, your opponent must pay 1 to play or move a card this card's Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card to put all cards from beneath a Friend with Pumped into the discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust one of your Resources at home to give this card +2 power until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you win a faceoff involving this card, you may spend a card from beneath it to banish an opponent's Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you win a Troublemaker faceoff involving this card, score an additional point.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play you may choose 2 [Generosity] Friends from your discard pile. An opponent chooses 1 to put into your hand. You may put the other into play at your home.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: When one of your Friends is retired, you may exhaust this card. If you do, put a different Friend from your discard pile into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Retire an Accessory on this card to play an Accessory on this card for free.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent moves a Friend to this card's Problem, that opponent may pay 1. If they don't, exhaust that Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: During a faceoff involving this card, if you would put a flipped Friend card on the bottom of your deck, you may retire this card and pay 2 to put that Friend into play at this card's Problem instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your other Friends at this card's Problem have +1 power for each card beneath this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: At the start of any phase, you may spend a card from beneath this card to move this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: While an opponent's Mane Character is at home, each of your other characters at this card's Problem have +1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Critter] Friends don't count towards your home limit.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play you may search your deck for up to 2 [Critter] Friends and put them into your hand. Faceoff: Discard a [Critter] Friend to give a Friend +2 power until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card. While this card is exhausted, your [Critter] Friends at this its Problem each have +1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play at a Problem, you may dismiss a Resource on a Friend at that Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, dismiss a Resource.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Mane Character has +1 power while at a Problem with this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: At the start of a Score Phase, you may spend a card from beneath this card to put an opponent's Friend into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play at a Problem, you may unfrighten or ready a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust one of your Resources at home to move this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an opponent plays a Friend to a Problem with one of your face-down Troublemakers, uncover that Troublemaker.

card.name: Anything I Can Do To Help?

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Put an opponent's Friend or Resource into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Challenge an opponent's Troublemaker with one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an opponent plays a Friend, put that Friend into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Banish this card to beneath one of your Friends with Pumped.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Start a faceoff involving one of your Friends and an opponent's Friend with equal or greater power. The winner of the faceoff scores a point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: At the start of a faceoff, all players shuffle their decks.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Start a faceoff involving one of your Friends and an opponent's Friend with equal or greater power. The winner looks at their opponent's hand and chooses a card. That player puts that card on top of their deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Problem Faceoff: Choose a Friend in your discard pile. Put it into play at a Problem where a faceoff is being resolved. At the end of the faceoff, banish that Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose odd or even and then reveal the top card of your deck. If that card's printed power matches your choice, gain 1 and draw a card. Otherwise, draw a card. (0 counts as even.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Start a faceoff involving one of your Friends and an opponent's Friend with equal or greater power. The winner of the faceoff gains 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Troublemaker Faceoff: Frighten a Friend involved in the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Draw a card for each action token your opponent has, then discard the same number of cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Banish a Friend with 2 or less power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an opponent plays or moves a character, exhaust that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Start a faceoff invovling one of your Friends and an opponent's Friend with equal or greater power. At the end of the faceoff, the loser dismisses one of their Friends that was involved.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose a Problem. Your opponent moves one of their friends away from that Problem. If you control Princess Luna, gain 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Start a faceoff involving one of your Friends and an opponent's Friend with equal or greater power. At the end of the faceoff, the loser puts one of their Friends that was involved into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose a [Kindness] or [Generosity] character. That character gets +1 [Kindness] and +1 [Generosity] until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Faceoff: If you have Rainbow Dash or Applejack involved in this faceoff, flip an additional card. If you have Rainbow Dash and Applejack involved in this faceoff, flip 2 additional cards instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Challenge an opponent's face-up Troublemaker with all your characters at its Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose a [Loyalty] or [Magic] character. That character gets +1 [Loyalty] and +1 [Magic] until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Faceoff: If you have Princess Luna or Princess Celestia involved in this faceoff, flip an additional card. If you have Princess Luna and Princess Celestia involved in this faceoff, flip 2 additional cards instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Frighten a Friend with 2 power or less.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Dismiss a Friend with at least 4 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Dismiss all Friends with printed power of 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an opponent plays a Resource on a Friend, that opponent reattaches that Resource to another Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Until the end of the phase, you may play Friends and Resources from your discard pile. If a Friend or Resource would enter your discard pile this turn, banish it instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Put an exhausted Friend on top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: While that Friend is at a Problem, that Problem has 0 bonus points.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play on an opponent's ready Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card to uncover one of your Troublemakers.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card to banish an Event from your hand to beneath this card. Reaction: After the start of a faceoff, you may exhaust this card to put a banished card from beneath this card on the top of your deck and gain 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card and pay 1 to banish an opponent's Friend beneath this card. Main Phase: Pay 2 to dismiss this card and put any cards beneath hit into play at their owners' homes. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: That Friend has +1 power and is also [Generosity]. Main Phase: Pay 1 to reattach this card to another Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: When that Friend becomes exhausted, dismiss it.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play on one of your Friends.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your opponent must pay +1 to move a character to that Friend's Problem. Main Phase: Pay 1 to reattach this card to another one of your Friends.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play on one of your Friends.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust that Friend to give your Friends [Laughter] until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: If a player loses a faceoff involving that Troublemaker and would send a Friend home, dismiss that Friend instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card and pay 1 to move an opponent's character away from that Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Spend a card from beneath one of your Friends with Pumped to give that Friend +2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you score a Problem's bonus points, banish the top card of your deck beneath this card. Main Phase: Spend all the cards beneath this card and retire it to gain a number of action tokens equal to the number of cards spent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card and pay 1 to search your deck for a Troublemaker, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: At the start of your Troublemaker Phase, you may exhaust this card and pay 2 to turn a Troublemaker face-down.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, draw a card. If a player would draw a card during their Ready Phase, they draw 2 cards instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an opponent plays a Troublemaker, you may exhaust this card and pay 1 to move that face-down Troublemaker to another Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you defeat that Troublemaker, you may add its power to your next faceoff this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the start of a Faceoff, you may exhaust this card to put a card from your hand on the top of your deck.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play on an opponent's non-Epic Troublemaker.

property.name: Text
property.value: That Troublemaker loses and can't gain abilities during your Troublemaker Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a Troublemaker is played, you may ready one of your characters.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play on an opponent's Mane Character

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Score Phase, if that Mane Character is at home, that opponent's Friends each have -1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card and pay 1 to frighten an opponent's Friend at a Problem. While this card is exhausted, that card can't be unfrightened. Main Phase: Exhaust 2 of your characters to dismiss this card. Any player may activated this ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a Troublemaker is played, banish the top card of your deck beneath this card. Main Phase: Spend a card from beneath this card to move one of your characters to a Problem with a Troublemaker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this cards and one of your characters to add that character's power to another character's power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an opponent's Friend enters play at that Friend's Problem, you may retire this Resource to exhaust the played Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 4 to dismiss an opponent's Friend. This card is sent to that Friend's controller's home and they gain control of it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this card to a Problem, you may retire a Friend there to uncover this card. When this card is uncovered, all players shuffle their discard piles into their decks.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this card to a Problem, you may retire a Troublemaker you control there to uncover this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players can't challenge this Troublemaker unless they have at least 3 Friends at its Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is uncovered, you may move it to another Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is uncovered, you may frighten a Friend at its Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player challenges this card, that player moves one of their characters at this card's Problem home.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your opponent's Troublemaker Phase, they may pay 2 to turn this card face-down.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Troublemaker is uncovered, you may pay 3. If you do, banish an opposing Friend or Resource to beneath this card. Otherwise, dismiss this card. When this card leaves play or is turned face-down, put any cards beneath it into their owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player confronts this Problem, that player may pay 1 to frighten an opponent's Friend here.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem enters play, its owner may reattach a Resource from one of their Friends to another one of their Friends.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of this card's owner's turn, if their Mane Character is here, they may look at the top 2 cards of their deck and put them back in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: When involved in a Problem faceoff, this card's owner's Mane Character has +2 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters with Accessories on them have +1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: When involved in a faceoff, this card's owner's Mane Character has +1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players can't confront this Problem unless they have at least 4 characters here.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a Troublemaker is played here, that Troublemaker's owner may put a Friend here into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: While at this problem, this card's owner's Mane Character has +1 power during the Main Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player confronts this Problem, that player puts one of their Friends here into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card's owner may exhaust their Mane Character at a Problem to look at the top card of that Problem's deck and may put that card on the bottom of that deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player confronts this Problem, that player reveals the top card of their deck. If it's a Friend, they put it into their hand. Otherwise, they put it in the discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem enters play, each player discards a card for each action token they have.

card.name: Greeting Lots of Folks With Clout

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 1 to move your opponent's Main Character here. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: Friends with Resources on them can't be moved here.

property.name: Text
property.value: The first time a player plays a Friend here each turn, that player may ready another Friend here.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a player confronts this Problem, that player moves a character here home.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem is solved, dismiss a random Friend here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Friends without Resources on them can't be moved here.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card's owner wins a faceoff involving their Mane Character, that player may exhaust that Mane Character to score an additional point.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a Troublemaker is played here, its controller may pay 2 to uncover it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once this problem has been confronted, Troublemakers can't be played here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Problem Faceoff: Any player with a character involved in a Problem faceoff here may move a character here from another Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 3 to turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this side of the card is turned face up, you may search your deck for an Event, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. At the start of your Main Phase, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If you do, reveal a card from your hand. If the printed power on the card from your hand is greater, put the revealed card from your deck into your hand and turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 3 to turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this side of the card is turned face up, you may ready a Resource. Main Phase: Retire one of your Resources to add its power to one of your Yellow Friends until the end of this turn and turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card to draw 2 cards, then discard 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card to move it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, you may pay 1 to choose an opponent. That opponent chooses and discards a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the start of any phase, you may put this card into your hand to have all players shuffle their hands into their decks then draw 4 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Faceoff Reaction: When you flip a card, you may pay 1 to ignore that card's power and flip a new card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: At the start of any phase, you may banish this card and put it into play at the start of your next turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play with the top card of your deck revealed. This card's power is equal to the printed power of the top card of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you win a faceoff involving this card, you may spend any number of cards from beneath this card to score a point for each card spent.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you win a faceoff involving this card and Rarity, you may exhaust this card to score a point.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play at a Problem with an opponent's Troublemaker, this card gets +2 power until the end of the turn. Challenge that Troublemaker with this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: You must control Fluttershy to play this card. At the start of your turn, put a Harmony token on this card. Reaction: After you play a Friend with 2 or less power, you may remove 1 Harmony token from this card to give that Friend +2 power until the end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: You must control Twilight Sparkle to play this card. At the start of your turn, put a Harmony token on this card. Main Phase: Remove 2 Harmony tokens from this card to look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put any number of them on top of your deck in any order and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of a faceoff involving this card, exhaust a random character involved in the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is uncovered, move it to another problem. At the start of your opponent's Troublemaker phase, move this card to a Problem with a number of characters equal to or less than the number of characters at this card's Problem.
